segments.text: Hi , Jenny . You look like you are in a hurry to somewhere . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to the bank . I need to cash some checks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We can go to the bank together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will go to Japan on business for 5 days next Tuesday . I want to exchange some Japanese yen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Will you bring a lot of money with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . I plan to bring some cash and withdraw money at the ATM in Japan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have the bank card in Japan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nope . You can use the credit card to withdraw the money in foreign countries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds really convenient . Do you pay extra money to enjoy this service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . It is free of charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I will apply for a credit card when I go to the bank later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we are running out of time . The bank is going to close soon .
segments.speaker: S1
